snippet: After several seasons of makeup artists gently advocating a bushier look while women clung to pencil-thin arches (see: Gwen Stefani circa 1990s), a full yet controlled brow is officially in fashion.
abstract: After several seasons of makeup artists gently advocating a bushier look while women clung to pencil-thin arches (see: Gwen Stefani circa 1990s), a full yet controlled brow is officially in fashion.

headline.main: How Now Full Brow? Try Tattoos and Transplants
